TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division B Regional 6
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

School Name:

Check your team: ◻ Varsity ◻ JV1 JV2 ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.158.cipherString: I was bold in the pursuit of knowledge, never fearing to follow truth and reason to whatever results they led.
CIPHER.158.question: Decode this quote from Thomas Jefferson which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.158.author: Thomas Jefferson

CIPHER.172.cipherString: Spend more time doing things that make you forget about the time.
CIPHER.172.question: Decode this quote from Charlotte Eriksson which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told that it contains the letters MEDO.
CIPHER.172.author: Charlotte Eriksson

CIPHER.168.cipherString: Everything you invent is true: you can be sure of that. Poetry is a subject as precise as geometry.
CIPHER.168.question: A quote by Gustave Flaubert has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.168.author: Gustave Flaubert

CIPHER.159.cipherString: I've heard that hard work never killed anyone, but I say why take the chance?
CIPHER.159.question: The following quote by Ronald Reagan needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of DUCT.
CIPHER.159.author: Ronald Reagan

CIPHER.162.cipherString: We had to start somewhere, either succeed or fail, and then build what we knew as we went along.
CIPHER.162.question: A quote from Homer Hickam  has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it ends with LONG.
CIPHER.162.author: Homer Hickam

CIPHER.177.cipherString: Every success demands some kind of sacrifice, so don't fear to do it, just do it with love.
CIPHER.177.question: The following quote by Debasish Mridha needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of GROW and polybius key of PHOTOSYNTHESIZE.
CIPHER.177.author: Debasish Mridha

CIPHER.164.cipherString: A great soul is proof against injustice, pain, and mockery; and it would be invulnerable if it were not open to compassion.
CIPHER.164.question: Solve this quote by François-Anatole Thibault that has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K2 keyword.  You are told that nothing it contains the word PROOF.
CIPHER.164.author: François-Anatole Thibault

CIPHER.174.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 571036 968042. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.179.cipherString: La vida es un asunto serio, y ningún hombre se ha hecho grande o bueno con una dieta de amplias sonrisas.
CIPHER.179.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by John Blackie into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  It starts with LA VIDA.
CIPHER.179.author: John Blackie
CIPHER.179.translation: Life is an earnest business, and no man was ever made great or good by a diet of broad grins.

CIPHER.171.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 098 637208 13594. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.161.cipherString: Success is not about achieving perfection; it's about making progress and learning from failures.
CIPHER.161.question: Decode this quote heard on Pep Talk Radio which has been encoded with a Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.161.author: Pep Talk Radio

CIPHER.167.cipherString: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
CIPHER.167.question: Decode this quote from Will Durant which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told that it contains the letters DISCO.
CIPHER.167.author: Will Durant

CIPHER.180.cipherString: Light not your candle at both ends.
CIPHER.180.question: The following proverb needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=9 and b=3.
CIPHER.180.author: Proverb

CIPHER.175.cipherString: Fears which open doors for you are worth experiencing.
CIPHER.175.question: A quote by Sukant Ratnakar has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has DOORS in it corresponding to the encoded text D W M J O P C.
CIPHER.175.author: Sukant Ratnakar, Quantraz

CIPHER.163.cipherString: You cannot see beauty; you feel it.
CIPHER.163.question: The following quote by Debasish Mridha needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=15 and b=4.
CIPHER.163.author: Debasish Mridha, M.D.

CIPHER.182.cipherString: I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down.
CIPHER.182.question: A quote by Abraham Lincoln has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it starts with I'M.
CIPHER.182.author: Abraham Lincoln

CIPHER.178.cipherString: The best way to escape from a problem is to solve it.
CIPHER.178.question: The following odd symbols were found on a sheet of paper when a tomb was opened, but you recognized it as the Baconian alphabet, written by a prankster. It turns out to be a quote by Alan Saporta.  What does it say?
CIPHER.178.author: Alan Saporta

CIPHER.160.cipherString: Be the kind of person who dares to face life's challenges and overcome them rather than dodging them.
CIPHER.160.question: Decode this quote from Roy T. Bennett which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.160.author: Roy T. Bennett

CIPHER.169.cipherString: The greatest achievement is to outperform yourself.
CIPHER.169.question: The following letters encode a quote by Denis Waitley using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?
CIPHER.169.author: Denis Waitley

CIPHER.181.cipherString: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
CIPHER.181.question: A quote by William Saroyan has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.181.author: William Saroyan

CIPHER.165.cipherString: Ordinary people think merely of spending time; a man with any brains, of using it.
CIPHER.165.question: The following quote by Schopenhauer needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of PONDS and polybius key of BIODIVERSITY.
CIPHER.165.author: Schopenhauer.

CIPHER.166.cipherString: The most ink-red-bull service ewe can ren-dough to yore-self is to clear-lee de-feign Y dew ewe are hear and luv it out.
CIPHER.166.question: Decode the message from Daniel Anikor which was encoded with a K1 Aristocrat Cipher (after being run through a ‘sus' dictation system).
CIPHER.166.author: Daniel Anikor

CIPHER.173.cipherString: Age is a matter of feeling, not of years.
CIPHER.173.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by G. W. Curtis. using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text contains YEAR somewhere.
CIPHER.173.author: G. W. Curtis.

CIPHER.176.cipherString: Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.
CIPHER.176.question: Decode this quote from Nelson Mandela which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.176.author: Nelson Mandela

CIPHER.170.cipherString: Don't let your dreams stay buried under the comfort of your current success.
CIPHER.170.question: Solve this quote from Simeon Ivanov which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.170.author: Simeon Ivanov
